TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract OlkCheckBox implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._OlkCheckBox, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.OlkCheckBoxEvents_Event

summary.span: 一个控件，支持在一组已定义的复选框选项中选择一个或多个选项。

span.span: A control that supports one or more selections in a defined group of check box choices.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的事件成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the event members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 在窗体设计器中首次使用此控件之前，应将 Microsoft Outlook 复选框控件添加到控件工具箱中。

span.span: Before you use this control for the first time in the forms designer, add the Microsoft Outlook Check Box Control to the control toolbox.

para.span: 仅可以将此控件添加到 Outlook 窗体使用窗体设计器中的窗体区域。

span.span: You can only add this control to a form region in an Outlook form using the forms designer.

para.span: 下面是绑定到"重复"字段的复选框控件的一个示例。此控件支持 Microsoft Windows 主题。

span.span: The following is an example of a check box control that has been bound to the Recurring field. This control supports Microsoft Windows themes.

para.span: 有关 Outlook 控件的详细信息，请参阅自定义窗体中的控件

span.span: For more information about Outlook controls, see Controls in a Custom Form
